title: Boomer Esiason joins the show & when is the right time to replace a veteran QB?
itunes:title: Boomer Esiason joins the show & when is the right time to replace a veteran QB?
description:
Daniel Jeremiah & Bucky Brooks break down the decision to draft a Quarterback to replace an aging veteran at the position (2:30). Former MVP & Pro Bowl QB, Boomer Esiason, joins the show to talk about QBs and how to succeed as a signal caller in the NFL (8:05). Plus, DJ & Bucky talk the importance of drafting in the second round and why it’s wise to load up on Day 2 picks in the draft (30:40). To end the show, the guys answer fan questions (38:55).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
